original_text: Because of that, they will come to a bad end. It will be for them like a hot fire that destroys dry grass. Their roots will die and their flowers will blow away like dust. They have refused to obey the laws of the Lord Almighty. They have not listened to the message that the holy God of Israel has taught them.
korean_text: 이로 말미암아 불꽃이 그루터기를 삼킴 같이, 마른 풀이 불 속에 떨어짐 같이 그들의 뿌리가 썩겠고 꽃이 티끌처럼 날리리니 그들이 만군의 여호와의 율법을 버리며 이스라엘의 거룩하신 이의 말씀을 멸시하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Because of that, they will come to a bad end.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때문에 그들은 나쁜 끝을 맞이할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: It will be for them like a hot fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그들에게 뜨거운 불과 같을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and their flowers will blow away like dust.
They have refused to obey the laws of the Lord Almighty.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 전능하신 주님의 법을 순종하기를 거부했다.

sentences.original_text: They have not listened to the message
that the holy God of Israel has taught them.
